TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they freeze/vaporize due to lack of atmosphere and a magnetic field.

I wish my posts were more popular

Granted, Trolls swarm them.

I wish for better shaders.

Granted, but the version after it breaks them.

I wish for Dres to be a planet in real life.

Granted, but its just a dwarf planet and nobody cares about it

I wish that Pluto got it's revenge on the people who reclassified it.

Granted, it slams into their houses killing them

I wish for the ATK liberty to be canceled, it looks stupid.

Granted, but it already got canceled back in 2012.

I wish for the best thing ever.

Granted you get death and you go strait to hell

I wish for a huskey

Granted, you get a dead husky.

I wish for KSP version 0.50

Granted but by the time you get it you and the developers are dead

I wish for winged things

Granted. Do you like your ten thousand flying scorpians that just spawned in your house?

I wish to not think about flying scorpians.

Granted. You think about flying spiders instead.

I wish I knew what to wish for.

Granted but you never had a wish

I wish for the universe to explode if another movie licensed game comes out

Granted, but the game doesn't blow up it.

I wish the dinosaurs had a space program and didn't go extinct.

Granted, but this somehow leads to the events of the Super Mario Bros. Movie.

I wish for a WeeGee.

Granted but soon you watch

video and obey his orders,leading to your death.

I wish Weegee and Malleo were best friends.

Granted, but now they are the most powerful tag team in the history of ever, and they embark on a massive killing rampage that NEVER ENDS.

I wish for a KSP animated series.

Granted, but after 1 week it gets shutdown.

I wish the KSP animated series didn't shutdown.
Granted, but because ou grant the wish then de-shut it down, your brain gets corrupted and must reboot, causing memory loss of how to do KSP.

Granted.

I wish for Gregox to make a wish above

Granted, but it's invisible.

I wish that this wish wasn't hard to see

Granted, but it is now so bright that everyone burns their eyes from looking at it.

I wish that all KSP mods were stock.

Granted, but the overload of parts and plugins causes any computer to explode.

I wish I could understand the kerbal language.

Granted, but now you can understand only the kerbal language.

I wish I knew everything.

Granted, you know of everythink that has ever happened, is happening, or will happen, and your brain shuts down from memory overload.

I wish that the person 73 posts ahead of me will post immediately after me.

Granted, i am here, but i will horribly corrupt your wish.

I wish could travel to the future.

Edited August 19, 2013 by aceassasin
